name: Internet CC
title: StaticBuilder - Create Ultra-Fast Static Websites
hero.title: Create Static Websites
hero.description: Create beautiful, fast, and secure websites in minutes. No coding required. Choose from professional templates and customize with our intuitive drag-and-drop builder.

hero.features.title: Secure by Default
hero.features.description: No server vulnerabilities to worry about

features.title: Drag-and-Drop Builder
features.description: Intuitive visual editor with pre-built components. No programming skills required.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: All templates are fully responsive and look perfect on any device.

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.description: Built-in tools to help your website rank better in search results.

features.title: One-Click Deployment
features.description: Deploy instantly to popular platforms like Vercel, Netlify, or GitHub Pages.

features.title: Performance First
features.description: Optimized builds with lazy loading, image compression, and minification.

features.title: Everything You Need to Create Amazing Websites
features.subTitle: Powerful features that make website creation simple and enjoyable
